definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Hard find … a mossy leaf-tailed gecko is nearly impossible to spot on tree.
sentences.chinese: 这只苔藓满身的扁叶尾壁虎趴在树上，几乎认不出来。

sentences.english: Hope scars, realized that even with life, are often trapped.
sentences.chinese: 望满身伤痕，才明白即使嬉笑一生，也常被困。

sentences.english: Dust-covered, the little boy doesn't cry.
sentences.chinese: 这个满身尘土的小男孩并没有哭。

sentences.english: In addition to vomit your face emerge spittle, you Mandehuaya play.
sentences.chinese: 除了吐你们满脸满身唾沫，还打得你们满地找牙。

sentences.english: The ladies smelling of poor perfume are accompanying them.
sentences.chinese: 却让那些满身劣质香水味的女娃作陪？

sentences.english: At the moment of impact, he would wake in a sweat.
sentences.chinese: 在碰撞的瞬间，他会满身大汗的醒来。

sentences.english: It's a dirty sharkskin full of poop .
sentences.chinese: 满身都是便便的臭臭鲨鱼皮。

sentences.english: They had been sawing; that was why they were covered in the sawdust.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直在锯木头，因此弄得满身都是锯末。

sentences.english: Tom had a bad fall and arrived home with mud on his clothes.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆重重地摔了一跤，到家时满身都是泥。
他们满身泥污且并未携带武器。

sentences.english: I brush my teeth and hop in the shower.
sentences.chinese: 我刷了牙，跳进淋浴，满身都是瘀伤。

sentences.english: Does he stink of the lamp?
sentences.chinese: 那盏灯是否让他满身臭气？

sentences.english: He arrived at Shelly Hot Springs, tired and dusty, on Sunday night.
sentences.chinese: 星期天晚上他筋疲力尽满身脏污地到达了雪莉温泉。

sentences.english: Lin Wenzheng comes home, he is bathed in sweat.
sentences.chinese: 林文正到家时，已是满身大汗。

sentences.english: Did you Eva see such a sweaty-looking superstar?
sentences.chinese: 你伊娃看到这样一个满身是汗的前瞻性巨星了吗？

sentences.english: Your whole body is feeling heavy and relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 你的满身感想很是地綦重沉重和放松。

definition: whole body/from head to toe/single person/a suit of clothes
across one's whole face/(smiling) from ear to ear
muddy/covered in (mud, dust, sweat, blood etc)/daubed in
messy hair and dirty face/bad appearance
covered all over with cuts and bruises/beaten black and blue/be a mass of bruises
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
a full mouth of (sth physical)/to have the mouth exclusively filled with (a certain language, lies, promises, etc)
